name: Lone Survivor (itch) (vocare4)
description:
Hello, this is my first GameJam and was really excited to participate! Sadly I was not able to finish the end, but will be updating the game once I have completed the last part of the code. 

Description

You are the only one surviving dwarf in these lands, and you have been notified that the Mountain demon who destroyed your clan is about to escape!
You must stop him!!

Controls

W, A, S, D to move around. Use your mouse to look around. 

Assets used:

Models - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/dungeons/polygon-dungeon-r...

Animations - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/animations/mega-animations-pack-162341
